entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE LOWER 30S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

RAIN
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

entry.em: MARTIN LUTHER KING JR DAY AND MONDAY NIGHT
entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
